text: I'm looking for the HubSpot Boilerplate Template Pack. I have filled in the request form multiple times, but I didn't get the files injected into my portal. Somebody knows how to do this?
Idk if there's a template pack but if you simply Google HubSpot boilerplate css, you'll get a boilerplate css file you can start from
Hi. Is it possible to assign multiple domains to the landing page functionality?
With Marketing Hub Enterprise, yes, otherwise no

Correct, in fact. doing <http://info.domain.com|info.domain.com> and <http://go.domain.com|go.domain.com> on landing pages requires enterprise.  <http://info.domainA.com|info.domainA.com> and <http://info.domainB.com|info.domainB.com> would actually require a domains add on in addition to enterprise
just got notified of 2 more occurences, but it appears to be right around the time I reported this. There’s a chance it occurred before you fixed it.
ok great, thanks for letting me know
I might be an idiot, but I just now realized the gear icon takes you to the settings based on the current screen you’re on in the back end. honestly that’s a confusing experience.
but it might save a click or two

that may be true, but I thought I couldn’t find some settings because I thought that options thing went to the website area because when you launch it from the design manager it always takes you there

so we've moved away from dev in HubSpot. However, going back and editing one of our sites.Everything's worked fine, however when we've made updates and saved the template, all of a sudden HS says it can't find the template included template partials. (we have includes for header and footer).
to make matters even more fun, the same include tag works in my site's homepage, but not the blog listing page.
missing template on blog listing page
no problem with template :faceplam:  (this is from homepage)
did something change that I wasn't aware of?
Hey <@U98Q2GNL9>, wanna DM me where you're seeing this? happy to take a look.
thanks <@UBFA10FMF> most of this seems to have cleared up, but still some odd happenings that I just sent you
